sqlMap.select: SELECT BG_IMG_SEQ, PATH, ORG_NAME, SAVE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, REG_EMAIL, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') REG_DATE FROM BACKGROUND_IMG WHERE DISP_YN='Y' ORDER BY BG_IMG_SEQ DESC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BACKGROUND_IMG (BG_IMG_SEQ, PATH, ORG_NAME, SAVE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, REG_EMAIL, REG_IP, UPD_EMAIL, UPD_IP) VALUES (BG_IMG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #path#, #org_name#, #save_name#, #file_size#, #reg_email#, #reg_ip#, #reg_email#, #reg_ip#)
